kv4.2:4.3: Hañci saha upapattiyā sotāpanno na hoti, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv4.2:5.3: Hañci saha upapattiyā sakadāgāmī na hoti, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv4.2:6.3: Hañci saha upapattiyā anāgāmī na hoti, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv4.2:8.1: ☑ Sāriputto thero na saha upapattiyā arahāti?
kv4.2:8.3: Hañci sāriputto thero na saha upapattiyā arahā, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv4.2:9.5: mahāpanthako thero na saha upapattiyā arahāti?
kv4.2:9.7: Hañci mahāpanthako thero na saha upapattiyā arahā, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv4.2:10.3: Upapattesiyena cittena arahattaṃ sacchikaroti lokiyena sāsavena …pe… saṃkilesiyenāti?
kv4.2:11.3: Upapattesiyaṃ cittaṃ niyyānikaṃ khayagāmī bodhagāmī apacayagāmī anāsavaṃ …pe…
kv4.2:12.1: ☑ Nanu upapattesiyaṃ cittaṃ aniyyānikaṃ na khayagāmi na bodhagāmi na apacayagāmi sāsavaṃ …pe…
kv4.2:12.4: Hañci upapattesiyaṃ cittaṃ aniyyānikaṃ na khayagāmi na bodhagāmi na apacayagāmi sāsavaṃ …pe… saṃkilesiyaṃ, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv4.2:13.3: Upapattesiyena cittena rāgaṃ pajahati, dosaṃ pajahati, mohaṃ pajahati, anottappaṃ pajahatīti?
kv4.2:14.3: Upapattesiyaṃ cittaṃ maggo … satipaṭṭhānaṃ …pe… sammappadhānaṃ … iddhipādo … indriyaṃ … balaṃ … bojjhaṅgoti?
kv4.2:15.3: Upapattesiyena cittena dukkhaṃ parijānāti, samudayaṃ pajahati, nirodhaṃ sacchikaroti, maggaṃ bhāvetīti?
